intent_atoms.description: Fragment Fixture Coverage now includes multi-trun, negative data_offset, missing tfdt, and composition offset fixtures to cover fragment parser edge cases.
Validator & CLI Polish: audit downstream consumers of the fragment summaries (validators, CLI formatting) and queue readability or diagnostics adjustments enabled by new data.
Real-World Assets must wait for external licensing approvals before synthetic payloads can be replaced and regression baselines refreshed.

functional_units.name: Fragment Fixture Coverage
functional_units.description: Provides comprehensive test fixtures covering fragment parser edge cases such as multi-trun, negative data_offset, missing tfdt, and composition offset.

functional_units.name: Validator & CLI Polish
functional_units.description: Audits downstream consumers of fragment summaries, adjusting readability or diagnostics for validators and CLI formatting based on new data.

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secures licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H to replace synthetic payloads with real-world assets and refresh regression baselines.
